```{r}
team_name <- c("Chicago Bulls", "Golden State Warriors")
wins <- c(72, 73)
losses <- c(10, 9)
is_champion <- c(TRUE, FALSE)

great_nba_teams <- data.frame(team_name, wins, losses, is_champion, season, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```
